song_name: Don't Be Fooled by the Name
lyrics:
2 contributorsdon’t be fooled by the name lyricsverse 1
baby i heard the bad news
that you found another man
i must admit im not surprised
that youre doin it again

hes a guy who hit the big time
among high society
but heres some piece of good advice
and baby its for free

chorus
dont be fooled by the name no no no no no
remember you cant judge a book by the cover
or a painting by the frame

bridge
dont be fooled by the name no no no no
you got to look deeper inside
you got to find things that are hidin
stop look and listen to your mind na na na na na na na nind

verse 2
if you believe in fairy tales
you better go along
and join the mindset followed up by
pipers magic song
you might also likehis lovin kind of music
may fit but seriously
now heres some piece of good advice
and baby its on me

dont be fooled by the name no no no no
remember you cant judge a book by the cover
or a painting by the frame

bridge

you got to look deeper inside
you got to find things that are hidin
stop look and listen to your mind na na na na na nin nind
